React.memo è§£å†³äº†ä»€ä¹ˆé—®é¢˜? â€‹

React.memo æ˜¯ React 16.6 ç‰ˆæœ¬å¼•å…¥çš„ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œå®ƒæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªé«˜é˜¶ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œæ—¨åœ¨ä¼˜åŒ–å‡½æ•°ç»„ä»¶çš„æ€§èƒ½ã€‚é‚£ä¹ˆï¼Œå®ƒåˆ°åº•è§£å†³äº†ä»€ä¹ˆé—®é¢˜å‘¢ï¼Ÿ

React.memo åŸºç¡€ç”¨æ³• â€‹

é—®é¢˜ï¼šä¸å¿…è¦çš„æ¸²æŸ“ â€‹

åœ¨ React ä¸­ï¼Œç»„ä»¶çš„é‡æ–°æ¸²æŸ“é€šå¸¸æ˜¯ç”±äºçŠ¶æ€æˆ– props çš„å˜åŒ–å¼•èµ·çš„ã€‚ä½†æœ‰æ—¶ï¼Œå³ä½¿ç›¸å…³æ•°æ®æ²¡æœ‰å‘ç”Ÿå˜åŒ–ï¼Œç»„ä»¶ä¹Ÿå¯èƒ½ä¼šè¿›è¡Œä¸å¿…è¦çš„æ¸²æŸ“ã€‚è¿™ç§ä¸å¿…è¦çš„æ¸²æŸ“å¯èƒ½ä¼šå¯¼è‡´æ€§èƒ½ä¸‹é™ï¼Œå°¤å…¶æ˜¯åœ¨å¤æ‚çš„åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºä¸­ã€‚

demo ä»£ç 
jsx
import { useState } from "react";
import { Card, Button } from "antd";

function ChildComponent(props) {
  console.log("ChildComponent render");
  return <p>{props.text}</p>;
}

function ParentComponent() {
  const [count, setCount] = useState(0);

  return (
    <Card title="æ¡ˆä¾‹ demo">
      <p>Current count: {count}</p>
      <Button onClick={() => setCount(count + 1)} type="primary">
        Increment
      </Button>
      <ChildComponent text="æˆ‘æ˜¯å­ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œè¯·åœ¨æ§åˆ¶å°æŸ¥çœ‹æ‰“å°ç»“æœï¼" />
    </Card>
  );
}

export default ParentComponent;
import { useState } from "react";
import { Card, Button } from "antd";

function ChildComponent(props) {
  console.log("ChildComponent render");
  return <p>{props.text}</p>;
}

function ParentComponent() {
  const [count, setCount] = useState(0);

  return (
    <Card title="æ¡ˆä¾‹ demo">
      <p>Current count: {count}</p>
      <Button onClick={() => setCount(count + 1)} type="primary">
        Increment
      </Button>
      <ChildComponent text="æˆ‘æ˜¯å­ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œè¯·åœ¨æ§åˆ¶å°æŸ¥çœ‹æ‰“å°ç»“æœï¼" />
    </Card>
  );
}

export default ParentComponent;

React.memo çš„å·¥ä½œåŸç†æ˜¯å¯¹ç»„ä»¶çš„ props è¿›è¡Œæµ…æ¯”è¾ƒã€‚å¦‚æœä¼ é€’ç»™ç»„ä»¶çš„ props æ²¡æœ‰å‘ç”Ÿå˜åŒ–ï¼ŒReact.memo ä¼šå¤ç”¨ä¸Šä¸€æ¬¡çš„æ¸²æŸ“ç»“æœï¼Œä»è€Œé¿å…ä¸å¿…è¦çš„æ¸²æŸ“ã€‚

demo ä»£ç 
jsx
import { useState, memo } from "react";
import { Card, Button } from "antd";

function ChildComponent(props) {
  console.log("ChildComponent æ¸²æŸ“");
  return <p>{props.text}</p>;
}

const MemoizedChildComponent = memo(ChildComponent);

function ParentComponent() {
  const [count, setCount] = useState(0);

  return (
    <Card title="æ¡ˆä¾‹ demo">
      <p>Current count: {count}</p>
      <Button onClick={() => setCount(count + 1)} type="primary">
        Increment
      </Button>
      <MemoizedChildComponent text="æˆ‘æ˜¯ memoized å­ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œè¯·åœ¨æ§åˆ¶å°æŸ¥çœ‹æ‰“å°ç»“æœï¼" />
    </Card>
  );
}

export default ParentComponent;
import { useState, memo } from "react";
import { Card, Button } from "antd";

function ChildComponent(props) {
  console.log("ChildComponent æ¸²æŸ“");
  return <p>{props.text}</p>;
}

const MemoizedChildComponent = memo(ChildComponent);

function ParentComponent() {
  const [count, setCount] = useState(0);

  return (
    <Card title="æ¡ˆä¾‹ demo">
      <p>Current count: {count}</p>
      <Button onClick={() => setCount(count + 1)} type="primary">
        Increment
      </Button>
      <MemoizedChildComponent text="æˆ‘æ˜¯ memoized å­ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œè¯·åœ¨æ§åˆ¶å°æŸ¥çœ‹æ‰“å°ç»“æœï¼" />
    </Card>
  );

export default ParentComponent;

const areEqual = (prevProps, nextProps) => {
  // æ£€æŸ¥userå¯¹è±¡ä¸­çš„idå’Œnameå­—æ®µæ˜¯å¦ç›¸åŒ
  return (
    prevProps.user.id === nextProps.user.id &&
    prevProps.user.name === nextProps.user.name
  );
};

const User = React.memo(({ user, onUpdate }) => {
  // ç»„ä»¶é€»è¾‘
}, areEqual);

demo ä»£ç 
jsx
import { useState, memo } from "react";
import { Card, Button } from "antd";

function ChildComponent(props) {
  const { getText } = props;
  console.log("ChildComponent render");
  return <p>{getText()}</p>;
}

const MemoizedChildComponent = memo(ChildComponent);

function ParentComponent() {
  const [count, setCount] = useState(0);

  const getText = () => {
    return "æˆ‘æ˜¯å­ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œè¯·åœ¨æ§åˆ¶å°æŸ¥çœ‹æ‰“å°ç»“æœï¼";
  };

  return (
    <Card title="æ¡ˆä¾‹ demo">
      <p>Current count: {count}</p>
      <Button onClick={() => setCount(count + 1)} type="primary">
        Increment
      </Button>
      <MemoizedChildComponent getText={getText} />
    </Card>
  );
}

export default ParentComponent;
import { useState, memo } from "react";
import { Card, Button } from "antd";

function ChildComponent(props) {
  const { getText } = props;
  console.log("ChildComponent render");
  return <p>{getText()}</p>;
}

const MemoizedChildComponent = memo(ChildComponent);

function ParentComponent() {
  const [count, setCount] = useState(0);

  const getText = () => {
    return "æˆ‘æ˜¯å­ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œè¯·åœ¨æ§åˆ¶å°æŸ¥çœ‹æ‰“å°ç»“æœï¼";
  };

  return (
    <Card title="æ¡ˆä¾‹ demo">
      <p>Current count: {count}</p>
      <Button onClick={() => setCount(count + 1)} type="primary">
        Increment
      </Button>
      <MemoizedChildComponent getText={getText} />
    </Card>
  );
}

export default ParentComponent;

åœ¨ä¸Šè¿°æ¡ˆä¾‹ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬è§‚å¯Ÿåˆ°ä»¥ä¸‹æƒ…å†µï¼š

å½“ç‚¹å‡» Increment æŒ‰é’®æ—¶ï¼Œçˆ¶ç»„ä»¶çš„çŠ¶æ€ count å‘ç”Ÿå˜åŒ–ï¼Œå¯¼è‡´çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶é‡æ–°æ¸²æŸ“ã€‚ç”±äºçˆ¶ç»„ä»¶é‡æ–°æ¸²æŸ“ï¼ŒgetText å‡½æ•°ä¹Ÿä¼šè¢«é‡æ–°åˆ›å»ºã€‚

ç”±äºä½¿ç”¨äº† memo å¯¹ ChildComponent è¿›è¡Œäº†åŒ…è£¹ï¼ŒMemoizedChildComponent ä¼šè¿›è¡Œæµ…æ¯”è¾ƒä»¥å†³å®šæ˜¯å¦é‡æ–°æ¸²æŸ“ã€‚ç”±äº getText å‡½æ•°åœ¨æ¯æ¬¡æ¸²æŸ“æ—¶éƒ½æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„å®ä¾‹ï¼Œæµ…æ¯”è¾ƒä¼šè®¤ä¸ºè¯¥å‡½æ•°å‘ç”Ÿäº†å˜åŒ–ï¼Œå› æ­¤ä¼šè§¦å‘å­ç»„ä»¶çš„é‡æ–°æ¸²æŸ“ã€‚

è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆ â€‹

å¸¸è§çš„ä¸‰ç§è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆå¦‚ä¸‹:

1ã€å°†å‡½æ•°ç§»è‡³ç»„ä»¶å¤–éƒ¨ â€‹

å¦‚æœå‡½æ•°ä¸ä¾èµ–äºç»„ä»¶çš„ props æˆ– stateï¼Œæ‚¨å¯ä»¥å°†å…¶ç§»è‡³ç»„ä»¶å¤–éƒ¨ï¼Œè¿™æ ·å®ƒå°±ä¸ä¼šåœ¨æ¯æ¬¡æ¸²æŸ“æ—¶é‡æ–°åˆ›å»ºã€‚

demo ä»£ç 
jsx
import { useState, memo } from "react";
import { Card, Button } from "antd";

function ChildComponent(props) {
  const { getText } = props;
  console.log("ChildComponent render");
  return <p>{getText()}</p>;
}

const MemoizedChildComponent = memo(ChildComponent);

// åœ¨çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶å¤–éƒ¨å®šä¹‰å‡½æ•°
const getText = () => {
  return "æˆ‘æ˜¯å­ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œè¯·åœ¨æ§åˆ¶å°æŸ¥çœ‹æ‰“å°ç»“æœï¼";
};

function ParentComponent() {
  const [count, setCount] = useState(0);

  return (
    <Card title="æ¡ˆä¾‹ demo">
      <p>Current count: {count}</p>
      <Button onClick={() => setCount(count + 1)} type="primary">
        Increment
      </Button>
      <MemoizedChildComponent getText={getText} />
    </Card>
  );
}

export default ParentComponent;
import { useState, memo } from "react";
import { Card, Button } from "antd";

function ChildComponent(props) {
  const { getText } = props;
  console.log("ChildComponent render");
  return <p>{getText()}</p>;
}

const MemoizedChildComponent = memo(ChildComponent);

// åœ¨çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶å¤–éƒ¨å®šä¹‰å‡½æ•°
const getText = () => {
  return "æˆ‘æ˜¯å­ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œè¯·åœ¨æ§åˆ¶å°æŸ¥çœ‹æ‰“å°ç»“æœï¼";
};

function ParentComponent() {
  const [count, setCount] = useState(0);

  return (
    <Card title="æ¡ˆä¾‹ demo">
      <p>Current count: {count}</p>
      <Button onClick={() => setCount(count + 1)} type="primary">
        Increment
      </Button>
      <MemoizedChildComponent getText={getText} />
    </Card>
  );
}

export default ParentComponent;

2ã€ä½¿ç”¨ç±»ç»„ä»¶çš„æ–¹æ³• â€‹

å¦‚æœæ‚¨ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ˜¯ç±»ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å°†å‡½æ•°ä½œä¸ºç±»çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œè¿™æ ·å®ƒçš„å¼•ç”¨åœ¨é‡æ–°æ¸²æŸ“ä¹‹é—´å°±ä¼šä¿æŒä¸å˜ã€‚

demo ä»£ç 
jsx
import React, { Component } from "react";
import { Card, Button } from "antd";

class ChildComponent extends Component {
  render() {
    const { getText } = this.props;
    console.log("ChildComponent render");
    return <p>{getText()}</p>;
  }
}

const MemoizedChildComponent = React.memo(ChildComponent);

class ParentComponent extends Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = {
      count: 0,
    };
  }

  getText = () => {
    return "æˆ‘æ˜¯å­ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œè¯·åœ¨æ§åˆ¶å°æŸ¥çœ‹æ‰“å°ç»“æœï¼";
  };

  render() {
    const { count } = this.state;
    return (
      <Card title="æ¡ˆä¾‹ demo">
        <p>Current count: {count}</p>
        <Button
          onClick={() => this.setState({ count: this.state.count + 1 })}
          type="primary"
        >
          Increment
        </Button>
        <MemoizedChildComponent getText={this.getText} />
      </Card>
    );
  }
}

export default ParentComponent;
import React, { Component } from "react";
import { Card, Button } from "antd";

class ChildComponent extends Component {
  render() {
    const { getText } = this.props;
    console.log("ChildComponent render");
    return <p>{getText()}</p>;
  }
}

const MemoizedChildComponent = React.memo(ChildComponent);

class ParentComponent extends Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = {
      count: 0,
    };
  }

  getText = () => {
    return "æˆ‘æ˜¯å­ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œè¯·åœ¨æ§åˆ¶å°æŸ¥çœ‹æ‰“å°ç»“æœï¼";
  };

  render() {
    const { count } = this.state;
    return (
      <Card title="æ¡ˆä¾‹ demo">
        <p>Current count: {count}</p>
        <Button
          onClick={() => this.setState({ count: this.state.count + 1 })}
          type="primary"
        >
          Increment
        </Button>
        <MemoizedChildComponent getText={this.getText} />
      </Card>
    );
  }
}

export default ParentComponent;

3ã€ä½¿ç”¨ useCallback â€‹

å¦‚æœæ‚¨ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ˜¯å‡½æ•°ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ useCallback Hook æ¥ç¡®ä¿å‡½æ•°çš„å¼•ç”¨åœ¨é‡æ–°æ¸²æŸ“ä¹‹é—´ä¿æŒä¸å˜ã€‚

jsx
import { useState, memo, useCallback } from "react";
import { Card, Button } from "antd";

function ChildComponent(props) {
  const { getText } = props;
  console.log("ChildComponent render");
  return <p>{getText()}</p>;
}

const MemoizedChildComponent = memo(ChildComponent);

function ParentComponent() {
  const [count, setCount] = useState(0);

  const getText = useCallback(() => {
    return "æˆ‘æ˜¯å­ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œè¯·åœ¨æ§åˆ¶å°æŸ¥çœ‹æ‰“å°ç»“æœï¼";
  }, [/* ä¾èµ–åˆ—è¡¨ */]);

  return (
    <Card title="æ¡ˆä¾‹ demo">
      <p>Current count: {count}</p>
      <Button onClick={() => setCount(count + 1)} type="primary">
        Increment
      </Button>
      <MemoizedChildComponent getText={getText} />
    </Card>
  );
}

export default ParentComponent;

import { useState, memo } from "react";
import { Card, Button } from "antd";

function ChildComponent(props) {
  const { userInfo } = props;
  console.log("ChildComponent render");
  return <p>{userInfo.motto}</p>;
}

const MemoizedChildComponent = memo(ChildComponent);

function ParentComponent() {
  const [count, setCount] = useState(0);
  const [userInfo, setUserInfo] = useState({
    name: "å¼ ä¸‰",
    age: 18,
    motto: "æˆ‘æ˜¯å­ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œè¯·åœ¨æ§åˆ¶å°æŸ¥çœ‹æ‰“å°ç»“æœï¼",
  });

      <p>Current count: {count}</p>
      <Button onClick={() => setCount(count + 1)} type="primary">
        Increment
      </Button>
      <MemoizedChildComponent userInfo={userInfo} />
    </Card>
  );
}

3ã€ä½¿ç”¨ useMemo â€‹

åœ¨æŸäº›æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¸Œæœ›ç»„ä»¶çš„æŸäº›å±æ€§å‘ç”Ÿå˜åŒ–æ—¶ï¼Œç»„ä»¶ä¸ä¼šé‡æ–°æ¸²æŸ“ã€‚è¿™æ—¶ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨useMemoæ¥è¿”å›ç»„ä»¶çš„ memoized å€¼ï¼Œä»è€Œé¿å…ç»„ä»¶çš„é‡æ–°æ¸²æŸ“ã€‚

jsx
import { useState, memo, useMemo } from "react";
import { Card, Button } from "antd";

function ChildComponent(props) {
  const { userInfo } = props;
  console.log("ChildComponent render");
  return <p>{userInfo.motto}</p>;
}

const MemoizedChildComponent = memo(ChildComponent);

function ParentComponent() {
  const [count, setCount] = useState(0);

  const userInfo = useMemo(() => {
    return {
      name: "å¼ ä¸‰",
      age: 18,
      motto: "æˆ‘æ˜¯å­ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œè¯·åœ¨æ§åˆ¶å°æŸ¥çœ‹æ‰“å°ç»“æœï¼",
    };
  }, [/* ä¾èµ–åˆ—è¡¨ */]);

  return (
    <Card title="æ¡ˆä¾‹ demo">
      <p>Current count: {count}</p>
      <Button onClick={() => setCount(count + 1)} type="primary">
        Increment
      </Button>
      <MemoizedChildComponent userInfo={userInfo} />
    </Card>
  );
}

export default ParentComponent;
import { useState, memo, useMemo } from "react";

function ChildComponent(props) {
  const { userInfo } = props;
  console.log("ChildComponent render");
  return <p>{userInfo.motto}</p>;
}

const MemoizedChildComponent = memo(ChildComponent);

function ParentComponent() {
  const [count, setCount] = useState(0);

  const userInfo = useMemo(() => {
    return {
      name: "å¼ ä¸‰",
      age: 18,
      motto: "æˆ‘æ˜¯å­ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œè¯·åœ¨æ§åˆ¶å°æŸ¥çœ‹æ‰“å°ç»“æœï¼",
    };
  }, [/* ä¾èµ–åˆ—è¡¨ */]);

  return (
    <Card title="æ¡ˆä¾‹ demo">
      <p>Current count: {count}</p>
      <Button onClick={() => setCount(count + 1)} type="primary">
        Increment
      </Button>
      <MemoizedChildComponent userInfo={userInfo} />
    </Card>
